game_description: This is a one level demo for the upcoming full game to be released in late 2023. You're alive again...but only for an hour! Temporarily resurrected from the dead, you find yourself in a musty old crypt, buried deep in the bowels of a dark & mysterious dungeon. Your only chance at becoming permanently alive again is to embark on a quest to retrieve the Necronomicon - a terrible & forbidden book desired by the one who resurrected you - Nekros the Necromancer. Discover treasure, fight monsters, & solve the mysteries of the Dungeon of Nekros in this amazing RPG by Hidden Realms.
review_1: I was playing this game for a while and it was fun up until my weapons dissapeared i dropped my sword to interact with something and it vanished then my wand disappeared while i was climbing it was nowhere in the room i was in and i ended up having to surrender to the enemies because i wasnt able to kill them. This happened multiple different times. Please fix this. Other than than i had an overall enjoyable experience and would love to see more content.
review_2: I do not know if it is me that is just stupid, but have been all over the map at-lest 2 times but canâ€™t find the blue book. I have tried to open every door I was able to find but there was nothing there?
review_3: It's a bit boring not being able to skip dialogue, but other than that it's a great proof of concept. It'd be cool to see where this game goes, you don't see RPG games on vr that often and I think this was pretty fun. I hope to see a story in future iterations.
review_4: This game is a lot of fun. It's easy to get a hang of and there are lots of different weapons to find. The world is very immersive and always keeps my attention.
review_5: First, it's amazing that a lone dev could create this. I cannot WAIT to see what it's like completed, because it's a blast so far. Frustrating at times since the holsters aren't working for me, so it's a lot of scramble to drop weapons, try things out, then look for them on the ground again, but it's fun! Easily my favorite game so far!
